description: Sometimes we need validation for the answers we already know the answers to. Alexa will validated those questions for you and help you sleep at night.
exampleInteractions: Alexa ask tough questions what goes well with chicken
Alexa ask tough questions how do I fix politics
Alexa tell tough questions I need help with work
name: The Answer is Bacon
shortDescription: Ask the tough questions, get the right answer...every time.
